cgcloud__Sales_Organization__c.name: cgcloud__Sales_Organization__c
cgcloud__Sales_Organization__c.description: This object stores the details of the Sales Organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__APM_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores the measure codes that are defined for the accountproductmeasure table.

cgcloud__Account_Product_List_Type__c.description: Defines the Product List that's to be used.

cgcloud__Automatic_Promotion_Push__c.description: Activates the automatic push on leave of the promotion.

cgcloud__Available_Trade_Calendar_Color_.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars within the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Business_Unit__c.description: Reference to the book keeping segment.

cgcloud__Custom_Calendar__c.description: Reference to the custom calendar that's used for the sales org.

cgcloud__DMI_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores measure codes that are defined for the daily measurement table.

cgcloud__DMR_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores measure codes that are defined for the dailymeasurereal table.

cgcloud__Default_Mobility_Visit_Color__c.description: Field to define the default color of visits on the calendar of a mobility device.

cgcloud__Default_Price_List_Type__c.description: Default price list type of the sales organization.

cgcloud__Default_Price_Type__c.description: Default price type of the sales organization.

cgcloud__Default_Tactic_Fund_Template__c.description: Default template that's used as a fallback if no fund template is selected in the tactic.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Enable_Acc_Cat_WDS_Profile__c.description: Determines whether the account, category, account, and sales org-specific profiles use the Profile bucket share calculation, which is found first.

cgcloud__Enable_Account_Set_Search_in_TP.description: Determines whether the customer set search filter is available in the trade calendar filter.

cgcloud__Enable_Auto_Tactic_Fund_Assignm.description: Determines whether the tactic fund assignment is automatic.

cgcloud__Enable_Payment_Overwrite__c.description: Determines whether the payment can be overwritten for the sales organization.

cgcloud__Enable_Sub_Account_Search_In_TP.description: Determines whether the customer set search filter is available in the trade calendar filter.

cgcloud__Enable_Subperiod_Writeback__c.description: Determines whether the system stores subperiod values with writebacks.

cgcloud__Enable_Subset_Load_Optimization.description: Determines whether the system uses KPI subset configurations for optimized loading of KPIs in promotion and account plan.

cgcloud__Enable_Tactic_Condition_Creatio.description: Determines whether the condition can be created at the tactic level.

cgcloud__First_Day_Of_Week__c.description: Indicates the day of the week.

cgcloud__First_Week_Of_Year__c.description: Shows the week for call scheduling.

cgcloud__Geofence_Distance__c.description: Maximum distance(in kilometers) allowed for geofencing validation (start-of-day, end-of-day, visit).

cgcloud__Global_Sales_Org__c.description: Defines whether the current sales org is the global sales org.

cgcloud__Has_Activated_Business_Years__c.description: Indicates whether the business years are activated for the sales org.

cgcloud__Legal_Information__c.description: Legal information to be shown on the printouts.

cgcloud__Lookback_Period_In_Years__c.description: The products with an end date within the lookback period are selected for the calculation of account plan profit and loss and customer business plan.

cgcloud__PMR_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores measure codes that are defined for the WeeklyPromotionMeasureResult and MonthlyPromotionMeasureResult tables.

cgcloud__PM_Product_List_Relevant_Measur.description: Stores measure codes that are defined for the product measure table.

cgcloud__Promotion_Access_Definition_Pol.description: Defines whether the edit and access rights are dependent on either the product categories that the user has assigned or the account and product category relationship.

cgcloud__Promotion_Aggregation_Level__c.description: Defines at which level the product is located.

cgcloud__Sales_Org_Admin_User__c.description: Identifies the admin user of the sales org.

cgcloud__Sales_Org_Value__c.description: Value of the sales org that are defined in the global value picklist.

cgcloud__Should_Include_Discontinued_Pro.description: Indicates whether the discontinued products are included in the calculation of the account plan profit and loss and customer business plan. A single lookback period spans 380 days. The lookback period goes back from the start of the customer business plan or account plan. It goes back by 380 days for a 1-year period and 760 days for a 2-year period.

cgcloud__Used_Reference_Date__c.description: Determines the value that's selected in the view for the product hierarchy resolution reference date.

cgcloud__Visit_Start_Time__c.description: Stores the Visit Start Time value.

cgcloud__Volume_Unit__c.description: Item volume unit used for complex pricing.Assumption: All pricing relevant volume values (product master data, condition data) are interpreted in this overall specified unit.

cgcloud__WMI_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores the measure codes that are defined for the weeklymeasureint table.

cgcloud__WMR_Product_List_Relevant_Measu.description: Stores the measure codes that are defined for the weeklymeasurereal table.

cgcloud__Week_Day_Share_Profile__c.description: Reference to the weekday share profile that's used as the default for the sales organization.

cgcloud__Weight_Unit__c.description: Item weight unit that's used for complex pricing.Assumption: All pricing relevant weight values (product master data, condition data) are interpreted in this overall specified unit.
